scenes.name: Exterior
scenes.description: You stand before the weathered stone walls of an abandoned keep, overtaken by moss and vines. The surrounding landscape is murky with thick fog covering the swamp. Dead trees with hanging moss and swampy pools surround the keep. The main gate creaks with the swamp's breezes.

scenes.name: Entrance Hall
scenes.description: You step into a grand but now decrepit hall. Tattered banners hang on the walls, and a thick layer of dust covers the floor.

options.description: Proceed to the Kitchen and Storage
Head upstairs to the Living Quarters

scenes.name: Guard Room
scenes.description: This room, once watched by guards, is filled with old, rusted armor and weapons.

scenes.name: Kitchen and Storage
scenes.description: You find a large kitchen and storage area, where rotting wooden crates and barrels are scattered.

scenes.name: Living Quarters
scenes.description: You walk into rooms filled with rotten furniture and cobwebs, a remnant of the inhabitants who once lived here.

scenes.name: Library
scenes.description: A room filled with moldy books, scrolls, and old maps. Some knowledge might still be salvaged from here.
